definition: as for/when it comes to
to demand/to request/to coerce
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
variant of 說|说[shuo1]
to speak one's mind

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter, I guess she has.
sentences.chinese: 我妈给我发了一封挂号信，我想她有的事情要说。

sentences.english: I can't imagine what it will say.
sentences.chinese: 我无法想象这期节目将要说什么。

sentences.english: 0ne place where you find lots of backseat drivers is in politics.
sentences.chinese: 要说指手画脚的人，在政界你可以找到好多。

sentences.english: I'd like to say a few more words.
Susan: Because, I have a lot of things to say so you can just listen.
sentences.chinese: 因为我有很多话要说，你尽管听便是了。

sentences.english: Here’s what Garrison’s friend, Justin, had to say.
sentences.chinese: 这是加里森的朋友贾斯丁一定要说的。

sentences.english: But remember, you must say it like you mean it.
sentences.chinese: 但紧记，你要说得真有其事一样。

sentences.english: I have a lot to say, but don't know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 我有许多话要说，却不知从何说起。

sentences.english: What else would you say is the intention of this conference?
sentences.chinese: 对于这个会议的意图，你还有什么要说的么？

sentences.english: I try to guess what the other person will say next in English.
sentences.chinese: 尝试猜猜别葌朴下来要说的英文是什么。

sentences.english: Are you going to say"Love me"? If, not, hearken unto me.
sentences.chinese: 你要说“爱我”吗？若不然，你就听我说。

sentences.english: Now I waited to see if she would say or ask anything.
sentences.chinese: 现在我等着是否要说或问点什么。

sentences.english: LL: Yes, though I've been running around like a chicken with its head cut off.
sentences.chinese: 你为什么要说自己象没头公鸡一样跑来呢？

sentences.english: Last, I have to say "bargain" is not niggard.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我要说，讨价还价，不等于小气。

sentences.english: " Then all the people shall say, "Amen!"

definition: to talk about/to mention/(preposition) as for
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
to say sth
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
though/although
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
as everyone knows (idiom)
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
